project.Title: Asynchronous IO in Arduino Scheduler
project.description: This project adds functionality for buffered writing and a preemptive scheduler for Arduino.

project.Title: Mind-Masters
project.description: Mind Masters is a reproduction of the Mastermind game developed using Flask. This project uses Flask-SQLAlchemy, Flask-Bcrypt, and Flask-Login for database management, password encryption, and user authentication.

project.Title: my-drive
project.description: Ruby-on-Rails app that uses asynchronous data handling to interface with Google Drive API.

project.Title: Modelli-I.A
project.description: Implementation of various machine learning models which are: linear regression, gradient descent, neural network, KNN, decision trees and others
